Articles.Content:
Hey all, I had a few ideas;

1: Thrust limiters on EVA packs.

2: Fuel dump (switches your throttle into a dump throttle and lets you dump any fuel you don't want)

3: "Tracking lights" Basically a light you can attach to a ship that will follow another ship, say for example; is going to dock with it.

I have more my brain couldn't fish out, I'll add them as they come to me.

Edited January 22, 2014 by Sickle
Removed suggestions that are forbidden.

1: Yea, that's what I'm looking for when building big space stations.

2: Maybe, but not exactly what I'm thinking

3: YES!

4: Only a few games have done these kinds of things correctly (Spiderman 2 (and maybe 3) and Just Cause 2), so this might be quiet hard, especially for a game like KSP

5: Maybe nice if I come from EVA and my space station just exploded

Other suggestions:

1: We need this when using R.A.P.I.E.R.s/SABREs

2: Ok

3: Maybe, but not exactly what I'm looking for

4: Add submersible to it, and I like it

5: On the outside and on the inside (I wonder how those probes look from the inside, probably very Kerbal)

6: Can't you see Jool from a capsule on the launch platform?

1 - available Kerbal Attachment System

2 - yes, they are annoyingly overpowered

3 - available Vanguard plugin

4 - not possible, game engine limitation

5 - available, same mod as 3 above

Fuel dump - http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/kerbolarfuelvents/

Ejection systems, see 3 above

Camera for probes - http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/lazor-cam/

Telescope - http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/0-18-4-zeus-space-telescope/ and http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/hullcam-vds/

I do love the idea of a light that auto-tracks another craft, though it might end up being difficult to make work on craft that are too big.
